summary:
Main interests: lifestyle, physical activity, dietary patterns, sleep, cardiovascular diseases, dementia
Research domains: RCTs, epidemiology, implementation science, quantitative and qualitative


Enthusiastic team player with good social, organizational and analytic skills. I have a strong ability of abstract and critical thinking and like a challenge. My challenge is to do research which can be implemented in practice.

profile_positions.description:
Tasks amongst others: data management, data analysis, project management (Europe and China), guidance of PhD students

Research domains: large RCTs, epidemiology, implementation science, quantitative and qualitative

Main projects: 
PRODEMOS https://www.prodemos-project.eu
HATICE http://www.hatice.eu/
PreDIVA http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/19812459

profile_positions.description:
Projectcoordinator kiDs study

In the kiDs study we investigate the prevalence of vitamin D deficiency, its determinants and associations with health factors in infants and toddlers in the Netherlands
